summary.p: Converts an image from premultiplied to unpremultiplied alpha format.

p.i: Supported by Win2D but not Windows.UI.Composition.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Unpremultiply effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UnPremultiplyEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the UnPremultiplyEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for UnPremultiply effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of this CanvasImage, in device-independent units.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession,Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Matrix3x2)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the CanvasImage, in device-independent units.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.Name
member.summary: Attaches a user-defined name string to the effect.
